short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look to see if older versions of news articles are available on news-archive.uk

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
News Archive provides versioned copies of news articles from popular UK news sites. Use this plugin to show on the article if older versions the of news article is available on news-archive.uk.

Currently archived sources include: BBC, The Guardian, Al Jazeera and The New York Times.
